entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You delivered the third and fourth radios.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find the next two camps and deliver the radios. Camp delta is somewhere near the waypoint provided. Camp epsilon is somewhere inside the research and prison facility.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: [Jeb Maris] I was hoping I would be right this time! Oh well, I am a bomber...I deal in approximate locations. I'm sure you can find the camp on your own...make sure to put down a waypoint just in case.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: There should be someone in charge. Find that person and deliver the radio.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: [Jeb Maris] A radio check with camp delta was received. Good work. I hope you can find the next camp, their call sign is camp epsilon. Good luck.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Maris didn't know the location of camp epsilon but mentioned it might be inside the research and prison facility where the virus was first released.
entries.task06_comm_message_text: [Jeb Maris] You did it! Camp epsilon has checked in. You're done. When you get a chance, come back to my location.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Return to Zeb Maris and get the other radios.
